current HEAD code, this no longer works.  It is blocking the Web service 
scenarios.

      IVirtualComponent vc = ComponentCore.createComponent(webProject, 
moduleName);
      webEdit = WebArtifactEdit.getWebArtifactEditForRead(vc);  // line 124.
